linearized_input: Population characterstics - Household characteristics | Percent | (households With, a television, 2) (households With, electricity, 8) (households With, a bicycle, 32) (households With, a radio, 43) (households With, relatively safe drinking water, 66) (households With, iodised salt, 67) (households With, earth/ sand flooring, 79) (households With, traditional pit toilet, 86)
target: Possession of consumer durable goods is more common in urban areas than rural areas.

linearized_input: Current use of family planning by method | Percent of all women age 15-49 | (Traditional methods, 0.07) (Female sterilisation, 0.02) (Condom, 0.035) (Injectables, 0.04) (JUD, 0.005) (Pill, 0.05) (Not currently using, 0.78)
target: While 41 percent of women and 48 per cent of men say they have ever used any method of contraception, current use is actually about half of that rate (22 and 29 percent, respectively).

linearized_input: Current use of any method of family planning by background characteristics | Percent of women | (Percent of women using family planning methods, TRCHS 1999, 22) (Percent of women using family planning methods, TDHS 1991-92, 10) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Urban, 33) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Rural, 18) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Mainland, 23) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Zanzibar, 14) (Percent of women using family planning methods, No Education, 14) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Primary incomplete, 18) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Primary complete, 27) (Percent of women using family planning methods, Secondary and higher, 43)
target: There are substantial differences in current use according to place of residence and level of education.

linearized_input: Reproductive preferences and unmet need for family planning | Percent of all women age 15-49 | (WOMEN'S DESIRE TO SPACE CHILDREN, Percent of all women age 15-49) (Want child soon (<2 years), 24) (Want child later (2+ years), 31) (Want to stop childbearing, 25) (For spacing, 12) (For limiting, 6) (PERCENT OF DEMAND SATISFIED, 56)
target: About one-fifth of currently married women (22 percent) do not want another child or want to delay their next pregnancy but are not using any method of family planning to reach that goal.

linearized_input: Maternal, delivery, and postnatal care | Percent of births | (Received professional antenatal care, 93) (Received 1 or 2 tetanus toxoid injections, 83) (Delivered in a health facility, 44) (Received professional delivery assistance, 36) (Received postnatal care within 2 days of birth, 52)
target: Forty-four percent of the newborns in Tanzania are delivered in a health facility, a steady decline since 1991-1992 (53 percent) and 1996 (47 percent).

linearized_input: Percent of children vaccinated against better chances of the major childhood diseases. | Percent of children vaccinated | (CHILDREN WHO RECEIVED, Percent of children vaccinated) (BCG, 93) (DPT 3, 81) (Polio 3, 80) (Measles, 78) (All vaccinations, 68) (None, 5) (Urban, 81) (Rural, 66) (Mainland, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Children who are immunised have better chances of survival because they are protected from several serious child hood diseases.

linearized_input: Caractéristiques de la population : caractéristiques des ménages | Pourcentage | (ménages avec, Télévision, 2) (ménages avec, Électricité, 8) (ménages avec, Un vélo, 32) (ménages avec, une radio, 43) (ménages avec, Une eau potable relativement saine, 66) (ménages avec, du sel iodé, 67) (ménages avec, un sol en terre/sable, 79) (ménages avec, des toilettes à fosse traditionnelles, 86)
target: La possession de biens de consommation durables est plus courante dans les régions urbaines que dans les régions rurales.

linearized_input: Utilisation actuelle de la planification familiale par méthode | Pourcentage de toutes les femmes âgées de 15 à 49 ans | (Méthodes traditionnelles, 0.07) (Stérilisation féminine, 0.02) (Préservatif, 0.035) (Injectables, 0.04) (Dispositif intra-utérin, 0.005) (Pilule, 0.05) (Pas d'utilisation actuelle, 0.78)
target: Alors que 41 pour cent des femmes et 48 pour cent des hommes déclarent avoir déjà utilisé une méthode de contraception, l'utilisation actuelle représente en fait environ la moitié de ce taux (22 et 29 pour cent, respectivement).

linearized_input: Utilisation actuelle d'une méthode de planification familiale | Pourcentage de femmes | (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, TRCHS de 1999, 22) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, TDHS de 1991-1992, 10) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Région urbaine, 33) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Rurale, 18) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Continentale, 23) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Zanzibar, 14) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Aucune éducation, 14) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Primaire inachevée, 18) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Primaire terminée, 27) (Pourcentage de femmes utilisant des méthodes de planification familiale, Secondaire et supérieure, 43)
target: Il existe des différences substantielles dans l'utilisation actuelle selon le lieu de résidence et le niveau d'éducation.

linearized_input: Préférences en matière de procréation et besoins non satisfaits en matière de planification familiale | Pourcentage de toutes les femmes âgées de 15 à 49 ans | (LE DÉSIR DES FEMMES D'ESPACER LES ENFANTS, Pourcentage de toutes les femmes âgées de 15 à 49 ans) (Veulent un enfant bientôt (< 2 ans), 24) (Veulent un enfant plus tard (2 ans et plus), 31) (Vouloir arrêter de procréer, 25) (Pour avoir espacé, 12) (Pour avoir limité, 6) (POURCENTAGE DE LA DEMANDE SATISFAITE, 56)
target: Environ un cinquième des femmes actuellement mariées (22 pour cent) ne veulent pas d'autre enfant ou veulent retarder leur prochaine grossesse mais n'utilisent aucune méthode de planification familiale pour atteindre cet objectif.

linearized_input: Soins maternels, d'accouchement et postnatals | Pourcentage de naissances | (A reçu des soins prénatals professionnels, 93) (A reçu 1 ou 2 injections d'anatoxine tétanique, 83) (A accouché dans un établissement de santé, 44) (A bénéficié d'une assistance professionnelle à l'accouchement, 36) (A reçu des soins postnatals dans les 2 jours suivant la naissance, 52)
target: Quarante-quatre pour cent des nouveau-nés en Tanzanie sont mis au monde dans un établissement de santé, une baisse constante depuis 1991-1992 (53 pour cent) et 1996 (47 pour cent).

linearized_input: Pourcentage d'enfants vaccinés contre les principales maladies infantiles les plus probables. | Pourcentage d'enfants vaccinés | (ENFANTS QUI ONT REÇU, Pourcentage d'enfants vaccinés) (BCG, 93) (DTP 3, 81) (Polio 3, 80) (Rougeole, 78) (Tous les vaccins, 68) (Aucune, 5) (Région urbaine, 81) (Rurale, 66) (Continentale, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Les enfants vaccinés ont de meilleures chances de survie car ils sont protégés contre plusieurs maladies infantiles graves.

linearized_input: Siffofin adadin yawan jama'a - Siffofin gidaje | Kaso | (gidaje tare da, Talabijin, 2) (gidaje tare da, Wutar lantarki, 8) (gidaje tare da, Keke, 32) (gidaje tare da, rediyo, 43) (gidaje tare da, Ruwan sha mai tsafta, 66) (gidaje tare da, dafaffen gishiri, 67) (gidaje tare da, daɓen ƙasa/ yashi, 79) (gidaje tare da, ban-ɗakin gargajiya, 86)
target: Mallakar kayayyakin da mai amfani ke aiki da su ya fi yawa a shiyoyin birni fiye da shiyoyin karkara.

linearized_input: Amfani da tsarin iyali a yanzu ta dubara | Kason dukkan mata 'yan shekaru 15-49 | (Dubarun gargajiya, 0.07) (Dabarar hana wa mace ɗaukar juna-biyu, 0.02) (Robar kwandom, 0.035) (Na allura, 0.04) (JUD, 0.005) (Ƙwayar magani, 0.05) (Ba a amfani a yanzu, 0.78)
target: A yayin kashi 41 na mata da kashi 48 na maza sun ce ba su taɓa amfani da kowace dubarar maganin hana ɗaukar juna-biyu, amfani na yanzu ya kasance kusan rabi a ainihi waɗannan alƙaluma (kashi 22 da kashi 29, kowanne).

linearized_input: Amfani da kowace dubara ta tsarin iyali | Kason mata | (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, TRCHS na 1999, 22) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, TDHS na 1991-92, 10) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Birni, 33) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Karkara, 18) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Cikin gari, 23) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Zanzibar, 14) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Ba ilimi, 14) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Ba a kammala firamare ba, 18) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, An kammala firamare, 27) (Kason matan da ke amfani da dubarun tsarin iyali, Sakandare da ta gaba, 43)
target: Akwai bambance-bambance masu ci gaba a amfani na yanzu bisa ga wurin zama da mataki na ilimi.

linearized_input: Zaɓin haihuwa da buƙatar da ba a cimma ba ta tsarin iyali | Kason dukkan mata 'yan shekaru 15-49 | (BUƘATAR MATA TA BA DA TAZARA TSAKANIN 'YA'YA, Kason dukkan mata 'yan shekaru 15-49) (Suna son ɗa da wuri (<shekaru 2), 24) (Suna sin ɗa daga baya (shekaru 2+), 31) (Suna son dakatar da samun 'ya'ya, 25) (Domin ba da tazara, 12) (Domin iyakancewa, 6) (KASON NEMAN DA AKA SAMU GAMSUWA, 56)
target: Kusan ɗaya bisa biyar na matan da suke da aure a yanzu haka (kashi 22) ba su son wani ɗa ko suna son yin jinkirin samun juna-biyu na gaba, amma ba su amfani da kowace dubara ta tsarin iyali domin cimma wannan buri.

linearized_input: Kiwon lafiyar mata, haihuwa da kulawar bayan haihuwa | Kason haife-haife | (An sami ƙwararriyar kulawar awon juna-biyu, 93) (Sun karɓi alluran hana ɗaukar cuta 1 ko 2, 83) (An haihu a assibiti, 44) (An sami taimakon ƙwararriyar kulawar awon juna-biyu, 36) (An sami kulawar bayan haihuwa a cikin kwanaki 2 na haihuwa, 52)
target: Kashi arba'in da huɗu na sababbin haihuwa a Tanzania an haife su ne a assibitoci, raguwa ta sosai tun 1991-1992 (kashi 53) da 1996 (kashi 47).

linearized_input: Kason yaran da aka yi wa alluran riga-kafin yiwuwar kamuwa da manyan cututtukan yara. | Kason yaran da aka yi wa riga-kafi | (YARAN DA SUKA KARƁA, Kason yaran da aka yi wa riga-kafi) (BCG, 93) (DPT 3, 81) (Polio 3, 80) (Ƙyanda, 78) (Dukkan alluran riga-kafi, 68) (Babu ko ɗaya, 5) (Birni, 81) (Karkara, 66) (Cikin gari, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Yaran da aka yi wa riga-kafi suna da damar tsira domin an ba su kariya daga cututtukan yara masu dama da suke lahani.

linearized_input: Njirimara ọnụọgụ ndị mmadụ - Njirimara ezinụlọ | Pasentị | (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, Igwe onyonyoo, 2) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, Ọkụ Latrik, 8) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, Anyịnya igwe, 32) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, redio, 43) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, Mmiri ọṅụṅụ dịtụ mma, 66) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, nnu nwere iodine, 67) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, ụwa/ ala aja, 79) (ezinụlọ ndị nwere, olulu mposi ọdịnala, 86)
target: Ojiji nke ngwaahịa ndị ahịa na adịgide ka dị na mpaghara mepere emepe karịa na mpaghara ime obodo.

linearized_input: Ojiji nke nhazi ezinụlọ ugbu a site na ụzọ | Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị niile dị afọ 15-49 | (Ụzọ ọdịnala, 0.07) (Ịgba nwanyị ọgwụ iji kwụsị ya ịmụ nwa kpamkpam, 0.02) (Okpu nnabụenyi, 0.035) (Ọgwụ ọgbụgba, 0.04) (JUD, 0.005) (Mkpụrụọgwụ, 0.05) (Anaghị eji ugbu a, 0.78)
target: Ebe pasentị 41 nke ụmụ nwanyị yana pasentị 48 nke ụmụ nwoke kwuru na ha ejibeghị ụzọ mgbochi afọ ime ọ bụla ma ncha, ojiji ugbu a bụ ọkara nke ọnụọgụ ahụ (pasentị 22 na 29 iche iche).

linearized_input: Ojiji nke ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ ọ bụla ugbu a | Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị | (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, TRCHS 1999, 22) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, TDHS 1991-92, 10) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Ebe mepere emepe, 33) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Ime obodo, 18) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Isi ala, 23) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Zanzibar, 14) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Agụghị Akwụkwọ, 14) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Emezughi praịmarị, 18) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Emezuru praịmarị, 27) (Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị na eji ụzọ nhazi ezinụlọ, Sekọndrị ma karịa, 43)
target: Enwere ndịiche pụtara ihie n'ojiji dị ugbu a site n'ebe obibi yana ọkwa nke agụmakwụkwọ.

linearized_input: Mmasị ịmụ nwa yana mkpa emezughi maka nhazi ezinụlọ | Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị niile dị afọ 15-49 | (MMASỊ NKE ỤMỤ NWANYỊ IJI KESAA ỤMỤAKA, Pasentị nke ụmụ nwanyị niile dị afọ 15-49) (Chọrọ nwa n'oge adịghị anya (afo <2), 24) (Chọrọ nwa ma emechaa (afọ 2+), 31) (Chọrọ ịkwụsị ịmụ nwa, 25) (Maka nkewa, 12) (Maka mmachi, 6) (PASENTỊ NKE ỌCHỊCHỌ EMEZURU, 56)
target: Ihe dị ka otu n'ime ụzọ ise nke ụmụ nwanyị nọ na di ugbu a (pasentị 22) achọghị nwa ọzọ ma ọ bụ chọrọ igbutu oge maka afọ ime ha na esote mana ha anaghị eji ụzọ nke nhazi ezinụlọ ọ bụla iji mezuo ebumnuche ahụ.

linearized_input: Nke nne, ịmụ nwa, na nlekọta ka amụchara nwa | Pasentị nke ọmụmụ nwa | (Nwetere nlekọta afọ ime n'aka ọkachamara, 93) (Nwetere 1 ogwụ ọgbụgba tetanus toxoid ma ọ bụ 2, 83) (Amụrụ n'ewumewu ahụike, 44) (Nwetere enyemaka n'ịmụ nwa n'aka ọkachamara, 36) (Nwetere nlekọta ka amụchara nwa n'ime ụbọchị 2 ka amụchara nwa, 52)
target: Pasentị iri anọ na anọ nke ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ na Tanzania ka amụrụ n'ewumewu ahụike, mgbatu na eme oge niile kemgbe 1991-1992 (pasentị 53) na 1996 (pasentị 47).

linearized_input: Pasentị nke ụmụaka agbara ọgwụ mgbochi nwere ohere ka mma igbochi ọrịa ụmụaka jọrọ njọ. | Pasentị nke ụmụaka agbara ọgwụ mgbochi | (ỤMỤAKA NWETARA, Pasentị nke ụmụaka agbara ọgwụ mgbochi) (BCG, 93) (DPT 3, 81) (Polio 3, 80) (Akpata, 78) (Ọgwụ mgbochi niile, 68) (Ọnweghị, 5) (Ebe mepere emepe, 81) (Ime obodo, 66) (Isi ala, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Ụmụaka agbara ọgwụ mgbochi nwere ohere ịdị ndụ ka mma n'ihi ha nwere mkpuchido maka ọtụtụ ọrịa ụmụaka jọrọ oke njọ.

linearized_input: Características da população – Características do agregado familiar | Por cento | (agregados familiares com, Televisão, 2) (agregados familiares com, Eletricidade, 8) (agregados familiares com, Bicicleta, 32) (agregados familiares com, um rádio, 43) (agregados familiares com, Água potável de uma fonte relativamente segura, 66) (agregados familiares com, sal iodado, 67) (agregados familiares com, piso de terra/areia, 79) (agregados familiares com, latrina tradicional, 86)
target: A existência de bens de consumo duráveis é mais comum nas áreas urbanas do que nas áreas rurais.

linearized_input: Recurso atual ao planeamento familiar por método | Percentagem de mulheres com idades entre os 15 e os 49 anos | (Métodos tradicionais, 0.07) (Esterilização feminina, 0.02) (Preservativo, 0.035) (Métodos injetáveis, 0.04) (DIU, 0.005) (Pílula, 0.05) (Nenhum método atualmente, 0.78)
target: 41 por cento das mulheres e 48 por cento dos homens afirmam que já utilizaram um método contracetivo no passado, mas a utilização atual situa-se em cerca de metade das referidas taxas (22 por cento e 29 por cento, respetivamente).

linearized_input: Utilização atual de qualquer método de planeamento familiar | Percentagem de mulheres | (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, TRCHS de 1999, 22) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, TDHS do período 1991-92, 10) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Urbana, 33) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Rural, 18) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Metrópole, 23) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Zanzibar, 14) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Sem escolaridade, 14) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Ensino primário incompleto, 18) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Ensino primário completo, 27) (Percentagem de mulheres que utilizam métodos de planeamento familiar, Secundário e superior completo, 43)
target: Existem diferenças substanciais ao nível da utilização atual em função do local de residência e do nível de escolaridade.

linearized_input: Preferências reprodutivas e necessidades não atendidas em matéria de planeamento familiar | Percentagem de mulheres com idades entre os 15 e os 49 anos | (DESEJO DAS MULHERES DE ESPAÇAR OS FILHOS, Percentagem de mulheres com idades entre os 15 e os 49 anos) (Pretendem ter um filho em breve (<2 anos), 24) (Pretendem ter um filho mais tarde (2+ anos), 31) (Não pretendem ter mais filhos, 25) (Espaçamento, 12) (Limitação, 6) (PERCENTAGEM DE PROCURA SATISFEITA, 56)
target: Cerca de um quinto das mulheres atualmente casadas (22 por cento) não pretendem ter outro filho ou pretendem adiar uma futura gravidez, mas não estão a utilizar nenhum método de planeamento familiar para alcançar esse objetivo.

linearized_input: Cuidados maternos, durante o parto e pós-natais | Percentagem de nascimentos | (Cuidados pré-natais prestados por um profissional, 93) (1 ou 2 injeções de toxoide tetânico, 83) (Parto em instituição de saúde, 44) (Assistência no parto prestada por um profissional, 36) (Cuidados pós-natais no prazo de 2 dias após o nascimento, 52)
target: O parto de quarenta e quatro por cento dos recém-nascidos da Tanzânia é realizado numa instituição de saúde, o que representa um declínio constante desde o período 1991 a 1992 (com 53 por cento) e desde 1996 (com 47 por cento).

linearized_input: Percentagem de crianças vacinadas em comparação com uma melhor proteção perante as principais doenças na infância. | Percentagem de crianças vacinadas | (CRIANÇAS QUE RECEBERAM, Percentagem de crianças vacinadas) (BCG, 93) (DTP 3, 81) (Pólio 3, 80) (Sarampo, 78) (Todas as vacinas, 68) (Nenhuma, 5) (Urbana, 81) (Rural, 66) (Metrópole, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: As crianças imunizadas têm melhores hipóteses de sobrevivência, pois estão protegidas contra várias doenças graves que ocorrem na infância.

linearized_input: Idadi ya watu na namna walivyo | Asilimia | (KAYA ZENYE, luninga, 2) (KAYA ZENYE, umeme, 8) (KAYA ZENYE, baiskeli, 32) (KAYA ZENYE, redio, 43) (KAYA ZENYE, maji yalyo salama kwa kunywa, 66) (KAYA ZENYE, chumvi yenye madini joto, 67) (KAYA ZENYE, sakafu ya udongo/mchanga, 79) (KAYA ZENYE, choo cha kawaida cha shimo, 86)
target: Hali ya nyumba inatuonyesha kiwango cha ustawi wa jamii na uchumi wa kaya na ni kichocheo cha hali ya afya ya KAYA ZENYE wana kaya.

linearized_input: Matumizi ya hivi sasa ya uzazi wa mpango kwa njia | (Asilimia 29 na 29) | (Njia za asili, 0.07) (Kufunga kizazi kwa wanawake, 0.02) (Mpira, 0.035) (Sindano, 0.04) (Kitanzi, 0.005) (Vidonge, 0.05) (Wasiotumia hivi sasa, 0.78)
target: Wakati asilimia 41 ya wanawake na asilimia 48 ya wanaume wanasema kutumia njia ya uzazi wa mpango, matumizi yalivyo hivi sasa ni karibu nusu ya asilimia hiyo (asilimia 22 kwa Matumizi ya hivi sasa ya njia yoyote wanawake na asilimia 29 kwa wanaume).

linearized_input: Matumizi ya hivi sasa ya njia yoyote ya uzazi wa mpango kwa | Asilimia | (TRCHS 1999, 22) (TDHS 1991-92, 10) (Mjini, 33) (Kijijini, 18) (Bara, 23) (Zanzibar, 14) (Hawana elimu, 14) (Hawajamaliza elimu ya msingi, 18) (Wamemaliza elimu ya msingi, 27) (Elimu ya sekondari na ya juu, 43)
target: Kuna tofauti kubwa kwa matumizi ya hivi sasa kufuatana na mahali wanapoishi na kiwango cha elimu.

linearized_input: Huduma kabla ya kujifungu, wakati wa kujifungua na baada | Asilimia | (Waliyopata huduma ya kitaalam kabla ya kujifungủa, 93) (Waliyopata sindano 1 au 2 za kuzuia pepopunda, 83) (Waliyojifungulia kwenye huduma za afya, 44) (Waliyopata msaada wa utaalam wakati wa kujifungua, 36) (Waliyopata huduma ya baada ya kujifungua katika kipindi kisichozidi siku 2 baada ya kujifungua, 52)
target: Asilimia arobaini na nne ya watoto wachanga wanaozaliwa Tanzania wanazaliwa katika sehemu zitoazo huduma za afya, umeshuka kidogo kuanzia mwaka 1991-92 (asilimia 53) hadi mwaka 1996 (asilimia 47).

linearized_input: Ni asilimia ngapi ya watoto wamepata chanjo za kujikinga na magonjwa | Asilimia ya watoto chanjo | (Watoto walioipata, Asilimia ya watoto chanjo) (BCG, 93) (DPT 3, 81) (Polio 3, 80) (Surua, 78) (Chanjo zote, 68) (Hawakuchanjwa, 5) (Mjini, 81) (Kijijini, 66) (Bara, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Watoto wanaopata chanjo wana uwezo mkubwa wa kuendelea kuishi kwa sababu wanajikinga na maradhi mengi yanayompata mtoto.

linearized_input: Matibabu ya watoto walio wahi kuumwa katika kipindi cha wiki 2 kabla ya utafiti | Asilimia | (watoto wenye umri chini ya miaka 5, Waliyopatwa na ARI au homa: waliopelekwa sehemu zitoazó huduma za afya, 68) (watoto wenye umri chini ya miaka 5, Waliyoharisha: waliopelekwa sehemu zitoazo huduma za afya, 63) (watoto wenye umri chini ya miaka 5, Waliyoharisha: waliopewa pakiti za ORS, 55) (watoto wenye umri chini ya miaka 5, Waliyopatwa na homa: wamepewa dawa ya kuzuia malaria, 53)
target: Kati ya kina mama watatu kwa kila wanne wenye watoto wa umri chini ya miaka mitano Tanzania wameeleza aina mbili au zaidi ya ishara zinazoonyesha kuwa mtoto ana matatizo.

linearized_input: Ìsesí àròpapọ̀ iye ènìyàn òlúgbé – Àwọn ìṣeṣí ilé ìgbé | Òdiwọ̀n ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún | (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, Ẹ̀rọ Amóhùnmáwòrán, 2) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, Iná ìjọba, 8) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, Kẹ̀kẹ́, 32) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, rédíò kan, 43) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, Omi mímu tíkò léwu láti mu, 66) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, iyọ̀, 67) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, ilẹ̀/ èrùpẹ̀ tí a fi wọ́ ilẹ̀, 79) (Ilé ìgbé pẹ̀lu, ìgbọ̀nsẹ̀ ìbílẹ̀ oníhò, 86)

linearized_input: Lílò ìfètòsọ́nọbíbí nípasẹ̀ ọ̀nà àtiṣe lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ | Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdun 15-49̣̀ | (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìbílẹ̀, 0.07) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Ìṣèmọ́tótó ti abo, 0.02) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Rọ́bà ìdáààbòbò, 0.035) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Àwọn tóṣéegún bíi abẹ́rẹ́, 0.04) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, JUD, 0.005) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Òògùn oníkóró, 0.05) (Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn wà láàrín ọdún 15-49, Tíkò lò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, 0.78)
target: Nígbàtí òdiwọ̀n ìdá 41 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn obìnrin àti òdiwọ̀n ìdá 48 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn ọkùnrin sọpé wọ́n ti lo èyíkèyí ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìdènà ìlóyún, lílò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ jẹ ìdajì tí òṣùwọ̀n ti tẹ́lẹ̀ (òdiwọ̀n ìdá 22 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún ati òdiwọ̀n ìdá 29 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún, lẹ́sẹẹsẹ).

linearized_input: Lílò ìfètòsọ́nọbíbí nípasẹ̀ ọ̀nà àtiṣe lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ | Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin | (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, TRCHS ti 1999, 22) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, TDHS ti 1991-92, 10) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Ìlú ńlá, 33) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Igbèríko, 18) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Orí-ilẹ̀ Gan-an-gan, 23) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Zanzibar, 14) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Kò kàwé rárá, 14) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Kò parí aláàkọ́bẹ̀rẹ̀, 18) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Ó parí aláàkọ́bẹ̀rẹ̀, 27) (Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn obìnrin tón lo àwọn ọ̀nà àtiṣe ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí, Ẹ̀kọ́ gíga àti èyí Tóga jù, 43)
target: Àwọn ìyàtọ̀ nlá wà nínú lílò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ tówà ní ìbámu sí ààyè ibùgbé àti ìpele ètò-ẹ̀kọ́.

linearized_input: Ìbísí tí a fẹ́ àti àìní tí a kòbá pàdé fún ìfètòṣọ́mọbíbí | Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọọrun àwọn obìnrin ti ọjọ́-orí wọn jẹ ọdun 15-49 | (Ìfẹ́ obìnrin ní láti fi ààyè sílẹ̀ láàrín ọmọ bíbí., Òdiwọn ìdá ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún gbogbo àwọn obìnrin tí ọjọ́-orí wọn wà  láàrín ọdún 15-49̣̀) (Ńfẹ́ ọmọ láìpẹ́ (tókéré sí ọdún méjì 2), 24) (Ńfẹ́ ọmọ ̣Nígbà tóbáyà (tójù ọdún méjì 2), 31) (Fẹ́ dẹ́kun láti máa bímọ, 25) (Fún fífi ààyè sílẹ̀, 12) (Fún ìdánilọwọkọ́, 6) (Òdiwọ̀n ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn ìbéèrè tí a bá pàdé, 56)
target: Nípa ìdá kan nínú ìdá márùn ti àwọn obìnrin tí óní ọkọ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ (Òdiwọ̀n ìdá 22 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún) kò fẹ́ ọmọ mìíràn tàbí fẹ́ láti fa ìdádúró oyún wọn tón bọ̀ ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò lo ọ̀nà èyíkèyí ti ìfètòsọ́mọbíbí láti dé ibi àfojúsùn náà.

linearized_input: Ìya, ìbímọ, àti ìtọ́jú lẹ́yìn ìbímọ | Òdiwọ̀n ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn ìbí | (Ti gba ìtọ́jú akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ Tósaájú Ìbímọ:, 93) (Gba Abẹ́rẹ́ ọ̀kan(1) tàbí méjì (2) tetanus toxoid, 83) (Tó bímọ ní ohun èlò́ ìlera kan, 44) (Gba ìrànlọ́wọ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ nígbà Ìbímọ:, 36) (Gba ìtọ́jú lẹ́yin ìbímọ láàrín ọjọ́ méjì(2) ti ìbímọ, 52)
target: Òdiwọ̀n ìdá 44 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún Àwọn ọmọ àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀bí in Ìlú Tanzania niwọ́n bí ni ohun èlò ìlera kan, ìdínkù tódúró láti 1991-1992 (Òdiwọ̀n ìdá 53 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún) àti 1996 (Òdiwọ̀n ìdá 47 nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún).

linearized_input: Òdiwọ̀n ìdá nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn ọmọdé tí a fún ní abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára ní ìgbógun ti àwọn ààrùn ọmọdé ní pàtàkì jùlo. | Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá Nínù Ìdá Ọgọ́ọ̀rún Àwọn Ọmọ tí a fún ní òògùn àjesára. | (ÀWON OMODÉ TO GBÀ, Òdiwọ̀n Ìdá Nínù Ìdá Ọgọ́ọ̀rún Àwọn Ọmọ tí a fún ní òògùn àjesára.) (BCG, 93) (DPT 3, 81) (Rọ́mọlápá-rọmọlẹ́ṣẹ̀ 3, 80) (Tìta, 78) (Gbogbo àwọn àjẹsára, 68) (Kìí ṣe ọ̀kankan, 5) (Ìlú ńlá, 81) (Ìgbèríko, 66) (Orí-ilẹ̀ Gan-an-gan, 68) (Zanzibar, 70)
target: Àwọn ọmọdé tí a fún ní àjẹsára ní àwọn ààyè tí ó dára jùlọ ti ìwáláàyè nítorí ààbò wọn láti ọwọ́ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ààrùn ọmọdé tó ṣe pàtàkì.

target: There are considerabble differences in contraceptive prevalence rates by residence: 17 percent of urban women use modern contraceptives, while use among rural women is only 2 percent.

linearized_input: الشكل 16 نسبة النساء المتزوجات حالياً وأعمارهن وأعمارهن 15-49 سنة ولديهن حاجة غير ملباة لتنظيم الأسرة | (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 1990, 9.7) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 1990, 16.8) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 1997, 9.9) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 1997, 10.2) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 2002, 7) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 2002, 7.9) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 2007, 5.7) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 2007, 8.2) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 2009, 6) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 2009, 7.4) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى المباعدة, 2012, 4.9) (الحاجة غير الملباة الى التوقف, 2012, 6.8)
target: ويبين الشكل 16 أن الحاجة غير الملباة للتوقف وللمباعدة أيظا كانت آخذة في الإنكفاظ، ولكن الإنكفاظ مرة أخرى لم يكن دومًا معنويا، إذ لم يكن التغيير في الحاجة غير الملباة معنويا بين عامي 1990 و 1997، أما بعد عام 1997 فأصبح الإنخفاظ في الحاجة  غير الملباة للمباعدة معنويا حيث إنخفضت من 9.9% عام 1997 إلى 5.7% عام 2007، ثم بقيت دون تغيير من قبل أنتعود مرة أخرى للإنخفاظ معنويا إلى 4.9% في عام 2012.
